"Ride with the flow: Instead of comparing yourself to others, focus on your own progress and enjoy the journey of learning and improving. Remember that everyone has their own unique strengths and weaknesses, so instead of jealousy, channel your energy into pushing yourself to become the best version of you."

"Pedal past jealousy: Use your feelings of jealousy as motivation to push yourself harder and achieve your own goals. Instead of dwelling on what others have accomplished, focus on your own progress and the sense of accomplishment that comes with it."

"Keep your pedals turning: Instead of getting caught up in the comparisons, remind yourself that everyone has their own unique journey and pace. Keep your focus on your own progress and the joy of riding a bicycle."

"Take a detour from jealousy: Instead of focusing on what others have accomplished, take a detour and focus on the beauty of the journey. Enjoy the fresh air, the sunshine, and the sense of freedom that comes with riding a bicycle."

"Pedal towards positivity: Instead of letting jealousy take over, focus on the positive aspects of your own journey. Celebrate your progress, no matter how small, and use it as motivation to keep going."
